msIdentifier.collection: Assistant Adjutant General Letter Book - No. 1 ; 5 Sept 1863 - 2 Feb 1864

body.p: It is ordered that Isaac Howard who enlisted in the service of the State of Kentucky in the Regiment proposed to be revised by Col A. G. Hobson under J. W. Underhill, be and he is hereby discharged the service of the State of Kentucky he never having been mustered into the service of the United States.

This discharge is granted upon his application and its acceptance by him is to be a waiver of all claim or demand by him upon the State of Kentucky or the United States for bounty, pay, allowance, or any compensation of any sort for enlistment or any service performed by him under it.

By order of the Governor
John Boyle
Adjt Genl Ky Vols
